name: Andy Shorley
text: Since this is the closest quick serve pizza place to my house, we have been here often. Service has been consistently good. Food always comes out hot. No complaints in the many times we have eaten here for both take out and in the dining area.

name: J Richardson
text: I used to LOVE pizza hut but not so much anymore. My favorite crust is the pan pizza but its so hit and miss. Often times the crust is like a soggy sponge and I hate it. Other times the crust is buttery and perfectly crispy like it should …More

name: Amber Banda
text: I used to love Pizza Hut as a kid. However I had an unpleasant experience in a different state. My girlfriend loves Pizza Hut and one night I was like fine that actually sounds good. This Pizza Hut is the best! Their pizza is always hot and …More

name: Gi Gi
text: After waiting over an hour to get my food, I called to see what the problem was and they said they never got an order from me. They asked for my number and told me I haven’t ordered there since October..... when I order there all the time …More

name: Lindsey Smith
text: We placed an order to be picked up last night for a large super suppreme pizza. First, were charged 2$ more than our coupon said. Oh well? The girl at the window was not wearing a mask or gloves. Our pizza came out in the regular box …More

name: Jimmy Nelson
text: Ordered delivery service, was told pizzas would be delivered in 55 minutes.  Waited 1 1/2 hour and called to check on order and was informed that I  never ordered, no apology for losing my order. Offered to deliver pizzas in 30 minutes. …More

name: Patsy Osborn
text: We have not had Pizza for quite awhile. We are on low sodium diet but was super hungry for Pizza Hut Pizza. We ordered a Thin crust, grilled chicken,onions,mushrooms and black olives. Super delish! The salad was a cold crispy Garden Salad! Yum.

name: ian henderson
text: I didn't dislike it

name: Alexander Luthor
text: Cold uncooked food. Delivery took almost two hours and I live five minutes away. They sent me a coupon for a free pizza as a way of saying sorry for my order being horrible but guess what, you have to spend a minimum of 7.99 in order to get it. I'll stick with Dominos.

name: Glen Guenther
text: This Pizza Hut is doing a lot better for us these days, especially during the COVID-19 problems. We don't get Pizza Hut as often as we did because we ALWAYS have to pick up orders from this location. The West Clay location is the one that …More

name: Lyndsey Krauss
text: Pizza is always hot and delicious but my wings NEVER have enough sauce. I’m talking dry chicken tender when I ordered the buffalo medium. I’ve even asked for extra sauce and still get dry tenders.

name: rodney robertson
text: Was very good had to go to the location on Elm Street because their website was not working and the location that I normally go to on West Clay refused to honor the deal that the website said it would provide but would keep gettin stuck. I …More

name: Brenda Wiltse
text: Pizza had hardly any sauce and not very cheesy.   Mild Boneless wings were awesome

name: Ian
text: Pizza hut isn't as good as it use to be, first time I tried it again in 4 months or so and remembered why I haven't got it on a while. People were great, but the product has gone down in quality.  The HUT needs to make better food or they will fall. I think DOMINOS is better, use to be the other way around, but now its switched,

name: leanna chapman
text: One of my favorite pizza places , bice . Fast correct order

name: Thomas Askins
text: Pizza hut has been good for at least 50 years that I've been going there fast service very nice staff

name: Holly Gibson
text: Waitress was great. Food was what pizza hut is.... sad with buffet you get only 1 salad, its caesar..... but still!! Only 1 salad? WTF.

name: Brandon Krepel
text: Dinning in here was an odd experience. They had a buffet, and it seems like it was maybe the most trafficked part of the dining experience, but it wasn't exactly a large buffet. They had table service, which we did, but there was only one …More

name: Vicki Briley
text: Great pizza. Great deals. Clean

name: Mini's Mommie
text: Pizza hut is great! My daughter loves their sasuage pan pizza. I am happy to report that on an order a mistake was made and I call right up and they corrected the issue in a professional way. I was so impressed, most places go the extra mile not to correct an issue but the great staff at pizza hut made it right!

text: Very good pizza. Good service.

text: Oh yeah, I love the meat lovers pizza, can't beat it.

name: Crystal Alpha

name: Pamela Upton
text: Small, could use better lighting during the day. The luncheon pizza bar not worth the cost.  Pasta cold to lukewarm at best.  Small variety of pizza's and more to the taste of those who can eat spicier foods unless want a cheese pizza slice.

name: Ryan Hettenhausen
text: Friendly service, clean resturaunt, food was good

name: Joe Abraham
text: I walked out with a medium buffalo chicken pizza and a dinner-sized tray of pasta w/ meat sauce for $10.  Can't complain.

name: William Fogarty
text: Didnt think there was a way to give zero stars. Eating in and ordered two pizzas and garlic knots. One pizza came out and twenty minutes later finally got the knots but the waitress said the other pizza was never put in. We cancelled the …More

name: Rick Hundelt
text: great server gal

name: Tracy Cooper
text: In the past, they rarely made my orders correctly. They always remade them or gave me a credit. This last time it was correct & it was really good. Shocking

text: The thin crust pizza is tough and hard.

name: K Y
text: Everything was perfect, delivery guy was friendly! Pizza and cookie hot and fresh! Good job guys!

name: Nate R
text: The pizza is always delicious. I usually order take out and pick it up on the way home from work, unfortunately I wait up to 15- 20 minutes to be brought a bill and/or greeted every time I do this. They seem consistantly short staffed.

text: The food was hot and delicious. We had the parmesan chicken bacon pizza. Our server Max did an excellent job.

text: Pizza is good. Delivery is fast. Sure miss the pizza Huts of the 80's and 90's. Inside is small but clean. Never very busy.

name: rose abernathy
text: Website it's terrible, hard to follow. Thought my order was complete went through what I thought  Was the whole process the Visa checkout waited an hour for my pizza call to see where it was at turns out my order was not complete and the store was closing. To late to get a pizza.  I will stick to old fashion calling in.

name: egg head
text: if i could rate 0 stars i would, jessica would not let me place my order and assumed my age. apparently she did not believe that i had money and that my order was legitimate. i am severely depressed someone fire jessica immediately. i give this .1 on yelp. gosh darn you sir pizza hut at new town blvd.

text: I ordered the extreme cheese crust pizza or whatever it is and it took them an hour to get to my house which is 7 minutes away. The crust where the balls of cheese are supposed to be are open and the pizza is very dry. Not at all what I …More

text: Good service decent pizza

text: I didn't expect much from a pizza hut buffet and since I was there at 11:30 AM maybe that's why it sucked. Hut yea, not a great experience for 12$ for the buffet, drink and tip. I won't be back to this location.

name: David Hale
text: Unfortunately often not very good. Mess up orders, food tastes poorly. Not sure if it's using ingredients past expiration or what.

name: Sebastian Kaiser
text:

Never again
